meta.title: JSON Minifier - Minify & Compress JSON Online
meta.description: Free online JSON minifier tool. Compress your JSON code by removing whitespace and comments to reduce file size. Validate JSON syntax instantly.

tagline: Minify, compress, and validate JSON code instantly

description.title: What is JSON Minifier?
description.text: JSON Minifier is a free online tool designed to help developers compress JSON data. It removes unnecessary whitespace, newlines, and indentation from your JSON code, significantly reducing its file size for faster transmission and storage.

howTo.title: How to Use JSON Minifier
steps: Paste your JSON code into the input box
Click 'Minify JSON' to compress the code
The tool will automatically validate and minify your JSON
Use the 'Copy' button to copy the result to your clipboard

questions.q: Is my JSON data sent to a server?
questions.a: No, all minification and validation are performed entirely within your browser using JavaScript. Your data never leaves your device.
Minifying JSON reduces the amount of data that needs to be transferred over the network, which can improve the loading speed and performance of your applications.
Yes, you can use a JSON Formatter tool to restore the indentation and readability of minified JSON.
